snippet: In remembrance and defiance, hundreds went to the movie theater in Aurora, Colo., on Thursday where a gunman killed 12 people.
abstract: Hundreds attend ceremonial reopening of movie theater in Aurora, Colo, that had been site of mass shooting in July 2012, after space is remodeled; some families touched by massacre say it is too soon, or simply insensitive, to open for regular business in building where their loved ones had been killed.
lead_paragraph: In remembrance and defiance, hundreds went to the movie theater in Aurora, Colo., on Thursday where a gunman killed 12 people.

headline.main: A Scene of Carnage Is a Movie Theater Again
headline.print_headline: A Scene of Carnage Is a Movie Theater Again
